ingredients.ingredient: ½ pound Dietz & Watson Gourmet Smoked Bacon
½ pound Dietz & Watson Chicken Bacon
1 (8 ounce) bottle Dietz & Watson Sandwich Spread
¼ pound Dietz & Watson Picante Provolone Cheese, sliced
¼ pound Dietz & Watson Peppadew NY State Cheddar Cheese, sliced
1 pound Dietz & Watson Smoked Gouda Cheese, sliced

cookingTips: Layer cheeses strategically with bacon in the middle to prevent them from sliding
Cook on medium-low heat to allow cheese to melt fully before bread browns too much
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This decadent sandwich combines three cheeses with dual bacon flavors. How would you balance cheese melting with bread toasting to achieve the perfect texture?
